text: i’m assuming since the update, the galapagos# hosts entries in my ~/.ssh/config i have are no longer valid?
i think the other one is still up too, but the activities within were killed off
the api and galapagos cms are still running on aws - we haven't completed the changeover because of some issues we are experiencing with ssl and heroku
i turned off www-2/galapagos2 but that wasn’t hosting anything anyone should need at this point
if i was wrong in that lmk and i can port stuff over to another instance or turn it back on
